-  /**

    * Load the ServerMatrix from files

    * @param matrix      the ServerMatrix
@@ -50,10 +49,9 @@ public interface MatrixFormat {

-    throws IOException;

   Matrix load(MatrixLoadContext loadContext, Configuration conf) throws IOException;
-}
